title: Barbara Mangan Pitocchelli, 87, teenaged tennis champion
text:
Published By: Philly Local & Regional - Today 
Barbara Mangan Pitocchelli, 87, of Rosemont, a teenage tennis champion who later made her mark as a respected player, umpire, and coach, die...
